alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walsenburg to 26 miles northwest of Delhi to 9 miles south of Avondale. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds may extend well away from any rain or lightning. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
